Description_lang: Mark a friendly player with Guiding Hand, healing them for $s1 every ${$t1}.1 sec for $d. If they fall below $s2% health, Guiding Hand is consumed to grant them a shield that prevents ${(1+$@versadmg)*$242623s1} damage for $242623d. (2 min recharge, 2 charges)
AuraDescription_lang: Healing $w1 every $t1 sec. If you fall below $s2% health, this will be consumed to grant you a shield preventing ${(1+$@versadmg)*$242623s1} damage.
